block.p: FPL GROUP INC., Juno Beach, Fla., owner of the largest utilities in Florida, said it bought the rights to build a natural-gas-fired 500-megawatt power plant in Johnston, which is near Providence, R.I., from Reliant Energy Inc., Houston, for an undisclosed price.

VERISIGN INC., Mountain View, Calif., a maker of online security software, said it was chosen by Pennsylvania to provide encryption services for the state's law-enforcement agencies over the Internet.

FPL GROUP INC., Juno Beach, Fla., owner of the largest utilities in Florida, said it bought the rights to build a natural-gas-fired 500-megawatt power plant in Johnston, which is near Providence, R.I., from Reliant Energy Inc., Houston, for an undisclosed price.

VERISIGN INC., Mountain View, Calif., a maker of online security software, said it was chosen by Pennsylvania to provide encryption services for the state's law-enforcement agencies over the Internet.

INTRAWEST CORP., Vancouver, British Columbia, , which develops and operates resorts across North America, said it planned to develop a $500 million luxury village and hotel at the Lake Las Vegas Resort.

TRANSCOASTAL MARINE SERVICES INC., Houston, which installs and repairs pipelines and provides repair and construction services to offshore oil rigs, said it filed for Chapter 7 bankruptcy in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the Southern District of Texas.
